title: Best 3150ip Champion
body: Hi, me again, this time I was wondering which 3150ip champion I should buy. I like champions with a fast wave clear and map presence that forces your enemy laner under a turret. Looking for a champion who's mainly played in mid lane but other roles are fine.

replies.body:
In the 3150 category,

Map presence? Now we're talking, {{champion:98}}.

Strong waveclear? Prob {{champion:34}} or {{champion:82}} .

Both? I would maybe say it's {{champion:80}}, {{champion:41}} or to some extent, {{champion:38}} and {{champion:55}}.
